subject: Climate & Environment
title: Offshore Wind Farms
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Offshore Wind Farms.

hook.text: Wind blows stronger and steadier over the ocean than over land. That's a huge advantage.

buildup.text: Denmark built the first offshore wind farm in 1991 with just 11 turbines.

discovery.text: Offshore turbines now stand 260 meters tall â€” taller than most skyscrapers.

twist.text: Floating platforms let turbines sit in deep water where winds are even stronger.

climax.text: The UK generates more offshore wind power than any other country on Earth.

punchline.text: The best wind farms are the ones you can't see from shore.

quiz.question: Which country built the first offshore wind farm?
